The Blessed One, together with the Sangha,
Having finished his day’s abiding, after a short while,

Sat down, having attained the state of Niradhas, and of Pīti,

Having risen from his state of cessation, the delighted Lord,
Went to the place of the excellent Silā-thūpa,
And having stood there and shown the Dhamma-sign,
He went through the sky to the delightful Jetavana.
